[Bassim Haider Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]
Quote dated June 2023: $835,931 and 35–45 working days downtime.

[Bassim Haider Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]
Did you understand that this quote included expected work arising from a typical 192-month inspection?

[Bassim Haider Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]

[Bassim Haider Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]

[Bassim Haider Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]
Was it important that the work be done at an authorized Gulfstream facility to preserve warranty coverage?
